verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid, of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm חֶֽסֶד־ <S%H2617><s%> che-sed- of mercy וּמִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-Pat and judgment אָשִׁ֑ירָה <S%H7891><s%> 'a-Shi-rah; I will sing לְךָ֖ le-Cha יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto thee O LORD אֲזַמֵּֽרָה׃ <S%H2167><s%> 'a-zam-Me-rah. will I sing

אַשְׂכִּ֤ילָה׀ <S%H7919><s%> 'as-Ki-lah I will behave myself wisely בְּדֶ֬רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech way תָּמִ֗ים <S%H8549><s%> ta-Mim, in a perfect מָ֭תַי <S%H4970><s%> Ma-tai When תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo O when wilt thou come אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai; to me אֶתְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> 'et-hal-Lech unto me;I will walk בְּתָם־ <S%H8537><s%> be-tom- with a perfect לְ֝בָבִ֗י <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vi, heart בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev within בֵּיתִֽי׃ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Ti. my house

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no אָשִׁ֨ית׀ <S%H7896><s%> 'a-Shit I will set לְנֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> le-Ne-ged before עֵינַ֗י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai, before mine eyes דְּֽבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- thing בְּלִ֫יָּ֥עַל <S%H1100><s%> be-Li-Ya-'al no wicked עֲשֹֽׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-soh- the work סֵטִ֥ים <S%H7750><s%> se-Tim of them that turn aside שָׂנֵ֑אתִי <S%H8130><s%> sa-Ne-ti; I hate לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo no יִדְבַּ֣ק <S%H1692><s%> yid-Bak [it] shall not cleave בִּֽי׃ Bi.

לֵבָ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav heart עִ֭קֵּשׁ <S%H6141><s%> 'Ik-kesh A froward יָס֣וּר <S%H5493><s%> ya-Sur shall depart מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni; at רָ֝֗ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra', a wicked לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo no אֵדָֽע׃ <S%H3045><s%> 'e-Da'. from me I will not know

מְלֹושְׁנִי me-lo-she-ni כמְלָשְׁנִ֬י <S%H3960><s%> me-la-she-Ni accuse קבַסֵּ֨תֶר׀ <S%H5643><s%> vas-Se-ter Whoso privily רֵעֵהוּ֮ <S%H7453><s%> re-'e-Hu his neighbour אוֹת֪וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To אַ֫צְמִ֥ית <S%H6789><s%> 'atz-Mit him will I cut off גְּֽבַהּ־ <S%H1362><s%> ge-vah- him that hath an high עֵ֭ינַיִם <S%H5869><s%> 'Ei-na-yim look וּרְחַ֣ב <S%H7342><s%> u-re-Chav and a proud לֵבָ֑ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav; heart אֹ֝ת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo No אוּכָֽל׃ <S%H3201><s%> 'u-Chal. will not I suffer

עֵינַ֤י׀ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai Mine eyes בְּנֶֽאֶמְנֵי־ <S%H539><s%> be-ne-'em-nei- [shall be] upon the faithful אֶרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> 'e-Retz of the land לָשֶׁ֪בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-She-vet that they may dwell עִמָּ֫דִ֥י <S%H5978><s%> 'im-Ma-Di who הֹ֭לֵךְ <S%H1980><s%> Ho-lech with me he that walketh בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> be-De-rech way תָּמִ֑ים <S%H8549><s%> ta-Mim; in a perfect ה֝֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, is the one יְשָׁרְתֵֽנִי׃ <S%H8334><s%> ye-sha-re-Te-ni. he shall serve

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not יֵשֵׁ֨ב׀ <S%H3427><s%> ye-Shev shall not dwell בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev within בֵּיתִי֮ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Ti my house עֹשֵׂ֪ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh He that worketh רְמִ֫יָּ֥ה <S%H7423><s%> re-Mi-Yah deceit דֹּבֵ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> do-Ver he that telleth שְׁקָרִ֑ים <S%H8267><s%> she-ka-Rim; lies לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not יִ֝כּ֗וֹן <S%H3559><s%> yik-Kon, shall not tarry לְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> le-Ne-ged before עֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai. in my sight

לַבְּקָרִ֗ים <S%H1242><s%> lab-be-ka-Rim, I will early אַצְמִ֥ית <S%H6789><s%> 'atz-Mit destroy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all רִשְׁעֵי־ <S%H7563><s%> rish-'ei- all the wicked אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; of the land לְהַכְרִ֥ית <S%H3772><s%> le-hach-Rit that I may cut off מֵֽעִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> me-'ir- from the city יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> Po-'a-lei doers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> 'A-ven. all wicked
